body: how create a team ? and when is the tournament?
body_tagged: how create a team ? and when is the tournament?
title: how create a team ?

replies.body: Tournament is in [-_-] it hasn't been scheduled yet. As for creating a team, all you have to do is make a post in the "teams" category and try to get some members.
replies.body_tagged: Tournament is in [-_-] it hasn't been scheduled yet. As for creating a team, all you have to do is make a post in the "teams" category and try to get some members.

replies.body: What kycrafft said is true. Its quite simple to create a team, just make a thread in the teams section notifying the community about your team and how to apply for it. As for a tournament, there isn't one scheduled currently but hopefully one will come in the near future!
